message.body: :) I'll call you back this evening when I'm done my walks and some last drop/crane show stuff I have to do
I can't come up w a good name :/ Annie wants cultivate something and that's dumb
Cultivate arts she wants :/ she's very granola and also that sounds like a nonprofit arts education camp for underprivileged kids
If you have any ideas of names that channel the idea of cultivate let me know
cultivate ... do you know that the world culture comes from cultivation
you are looking for a name for crane arts
space
cultivate crane
culture porch
C space
the cavalcades
hahaha
Lol
For the last drop And crane
She wants a name that shows that we take an artist from a coffee shop to a small gallery
So first we help them w everything - artist statement show etc
Then they do it more profesh at crane w a reception on art circuit
She wants something that shows it is a Growing experience for the artist-that we are nurturing emerging artists
By necessarily Young but all emerging meaning artists who don't have extensive exhibition history but who are committed to being professional artists
So far we mainly show young people bc that's who that tends to be but it's not age specific really

They just have to be 1.serious about being professional artist (have artist site, have consistent strong body of work etc, have statement and 2.not be established already (duh or why would they even want to show at coffee shop)
And 3. Be local
So she wants a name that encompasses that
we want to create a site and then apply to some small Philly grants
So that when the shows get a write up on a website, there is a link to the spaces/project that also has all the past exhibitions as well as a bio about Annie and I so we Get credit too
“Cohere”
“cultiva”
“colere” < latin for cultivate, inhabit
Roots Art
do u think its ok if i don’t go out on fridays bc i teach sat morning
or does that make me lame
I Never go out anymore unless it is a gallery event or a close friend's event
I truly have no time because I'm underemployed so I spend all my time outside of my two pt jobs on my side projects/networking
So it is Not lame at all and completely normal at our age!
￼Cute!
Alec said they remember Hannibal as the only dude who wasn't awful from that group lol
Haha the owners remember him, so adorable
My life has weirdly come full circle. The bar is super hipster now tho! Full of cute early twenties people
I feel old here haha
I remember when I felt so young here! Time fliiiies
